name: SunSenSim
description:
SunSenSim™ a simulation to sense the sun¡
isa fast-paced, beat em' up, shoot em' up kinda game!
w a s d, top-down 2D, psychedelic bullet heaven...
a singleplayer, space racing, open world parkour, PvE...
m superhero combat survival, physics sorta game : )

The objective is to drift, dodge, & shoot; without being got! Flow fast, as you certainly can; crash with might & grace~




w = push acceleration
a = left boost
s = pull acceleration
d = right boost
q = flare
e = block
Lshift = time
x = map
scroll = pov
mouse = aim
enjoy : )
